Hell, there was even some rich guy who lost something incredible like $7,000,000 in a week or so because of the tariffs and he was all "boo fucking hoo, no one told me how tariffs work, I thought this was mega success victory fun time starring Donald Trump". ***How can these people ever expect to be taken seriously*** when *this* is how they respond to something they "care so much about" yet know nothing about.
